com.qzw.contrllor

类 PublishPositionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qzw.contrllor.BaseContrllor
      • com.qzw.contrllor.PublishPositionController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="publishPosition")
public class PublishPositionController
extends BaseContrllor

    项目名称：qzw
